captions.text:
This is the coast of Namibia in southwestern
Africa, the very dry desert coast of the Namib

Desert. You can see a cloud band butting up
against the shore and some straight sand dunes

in the lower left of the picture. Yeah those
are big red sand dunes that the astronauts

say is one of the most beautiful sites that
you can get when you're flying.

Coming into the view on the left is an impact
crater right in the middle of the picture,

right about now and some wind streaks. We
know where this area is because it's a bit

unique. We've got a major dune field coming
into the picture on the left there: the Oriental

Sand Sea, as it's called in French, and on
the top is the Isawan Sand Sea.

This is the island of Sicily with cloud over
Mt. Etna, so you can't quite tell there's

a big volcano in the middle of the picture
right now. And there's the toe of the boot

of Italy coming into the picture from the
left. See a good example of sun glint on the
right with the sea reflecting the sun.

This is the smooth east coast of the Kamchatka
peninsula again. As you move inland it gets

even more striking as a picture because of
all the volcanoes on this peninsula and the

snowy mountains. There's a volcano just coming
into the picture from the top left there.
You can see a knob-shaped feature.

Here is a smaller finger of land in China
sticking into the Pacific Ocean. In winter

you can see all the snow lower left. This
is called the Qindoa P eninsula and we recognize

it. And again, the sun glint point moving
along the coast upper center.

In a very clear picture, the Zagros mountains
with snow on them in Iran, in the country
of Iran.

Here we have the north coast of Australia
and the gulf of Carpenteria and some islands.

The biggest island at the bottom of the screen
there is Groote island, which means the big
island in Dutch.

When you see a huge powerful feature like
this and the astronauts do shoot them a lot

and we have had some detailed views looking
right down the eye, looking at the eyewall.

In fact I seem to remember views of breaking
waves on the sea surface at the bottom of
the eye. Amazing detail.

Look at this neat picture of Great Salt Lake
in Utah. And the variation in color? That's

due to an almost a complete blockage of the
circulation of the lake by a trestle for a

railroad that crosses from one side to the
other. It stops the circulation and things

get a little bit saltier and certainly saltier
at the north end of the lake.

Here you see two circles coming in to the
top of the view now. These are either volcanoes

or effects from inside the earth producing
circular features. We think this is the Big
Bend area of Texas.

This is an interesting sideways view of the
peninsula of Florida, with the Keys stretching

out into the lowest part of the picture there.
And the shallow seas around the Bahama Islands

top right. And Cuba coming into the picture
lower right.

And this I believe is the coast of Northern
Chile in South America. It's a very straight

coast, except for that strange headland out
to the right just disappearing. And so the

desert is the first part of the inland zone,
and then you see much blacker at the top of

the picture the Andes Mountains with some
many dozens of volcanoes.

Here is a thunderhead. The typical look of
the thunderheads, the big rainstorms, that

develop over the Amazon Basin. And another
one coming in top right. Here's an obviously

a major river. There's an even bigger one
coming in on the right. That looks to me like

it could well be the Amazon River, with one
of its big tributaries on the left. And the

flow would seem to be from the bottom of the
picture to the top.

title: What an Astronaut's Camera Sees (from ISS)

comments.text:
Science has taught us that the earth has a 24hr rotation because that's how 
we get day & night & it takes 365 days for an orbit around the non-moving 
sun.  Science also states that the sun doesn't move & the earth spins & 
rotates hence, that's how we get our seasons.  So we get day & night from 
the spinning & we get our seasons from the yearly rotations around the sun. 
 In God's holy word (AKJB) Psalms 93:1, & 96:10, the sun moves around a 
fixed earth.  In the book of Job it states God hangeth the earth upon 
nothing.  The earth does NOT move.  In the book of Eccl 1:5, the sun also 
ariseth and the sun goeth down and hasteth to his place where he (the sun) 
arose.  Some scientist also say the earth is spinning/moving at 1040mph. 
 YEAH RIGHT!!!
At least NASA has it right - NASA tells us they plan ALL space shuttles 
return to earth & all calculations are based on a NON-MOVING EARTH.﻿

comments.text:
The one thing that bothers me is why no one asks why there are any robotic 
cameras located on the exterior of the space station. They made the space 
arm. Why not attach a camera to the space arm and have it do an arching 180 
degree camera pivot so that we can see the earth and then as it arches 
upwards we can see the solar system as well? The flat earth society are 
saying that NASA is purposely deceiving us by not showing any such camera 
maneuvers. I say that until NASA does these arching camera angles the flat 
earth society will always have a valid argument.﻿

comments.text:
+thenomaic
I have educated myself and the moon landing is clearly a fake. Is the laser 
reflector story the most convincing evidence for you that the moon landing 
occurred? Can you yourself get a hold of that laser and do tests? C'mon if 
they used billions of dollars to fake the moon landing then what a small 
token to fake the laser. And please please don't tell me that you can 
actually take a regular laser pointer and do this yourself because it is 
just going to show me how much of a child you really are. There is no probe 
on mars and no probe landed on an asteroid. These are stories you are being 
told. Consider that you actually do live in a Western version of North 
Korea and you will be closer to the truth than you have ever been in your 
entire life.
comments.author: Brad Miller

comments.text:
+Brad Miller Science does not care if you believe or not, It is about 
facts. And facts are the earth is not flat, i mean if in todays age people 
still believe that, they should not be allowed to reproduce for the sake of 
human kind.

As for the moon, your personal, inexperienced opinion does not matter, 
please go educate yourself and learn about the moon landings. They even 
actually put a laser reflector on the surface of the moon, when you point a 
laser at the moon it reflects back, don't you think it's a pretty hardcore 
evidence ? We can send a probe on mars, and land on a moving asteroid, 
going to the moon is easy ( but expensive and useless atm ).
comments.author: thenomaic

comments.text:
+thenomaic Its the suspension of disbelief that allows people to believe in 
secondary sources of evidence like video recordings. I am not the one 
believing. I am the one disbelieving. I assume you believe that man went to 
that large shining object in the sky we call the moon. I looked at the 
video of the first live broadcast for the so called moon landing and saw 
anomalies that infer cinema trickery. I can state definitively that if the 
live broadcast is reflective of how the moon landing took place then for 
sure Neil Armstrong and his buddies didn't land on the moon. The irony is 
that I am the one being called a lunatic (key word luna aka moon) but it is 
as obvious that those who believed that NASA landed there are the lunatics 
and it doesn't make it any less crazy that the majority of the world 
believes this way. Humans were all once children, we can all be brainwashed 
into adulthood. Think North Korea but on a different level and you get most 
of Western society.
comments.author: Brad Miller

comments.text:
+nbenge141995 At 3:53 in the picture I see what is called a matte, a cinema 
technique that they used quite regularly in filming movies like Star Wars. 
Why are you so opposed to any notion that NASA is faking its trips to some 
outer orbit we all call space? Would it freak you out if this so called 
"space" was nothing like our science fiction movies? You know it shouldn't 
because your life on this planet is on the ground with family, friends and 
your immediate community. That is your reality whether you like it or not. 
In regards to innovation. The harnessing of electricity was done on the 
ground and all proceeding inventions are a mere inevitability. Did the 
inspiration of space travel quicken the pace? Possibly, but at the end of 
the day it was a profit incentive that spurred innovation.

comments.text:
+Marlina Basir
One would simply say that the space station or shuttle craft is always 
inverted towards the earth so the astronauts would not be able to take 
video footage of the galaxy. I believe that if truly curious human beings 
were on board the space station they would along with doing acrobats in a 
zero G environment of the interior, be outside in their space suits with 
handheld video cameras like the ones mounted on the space station and video 
capturing various sweeping angles of the earth and the galaxy behind them. 
The fact that there is an absence of this sort of video footage shows that 
the flat earth society has a valid argument that the earth is not round 
because when it all comes down to it, a special effect of a circular black 
matte could be employed on all video footage of the earth from the space 
station making the earth look round. Until we see full 180 degree video 
pans of the earth and the galaxy behind, the flat earth society will 
technically have the stronger argument.

could not be a shadow from the ISS as the size of the ISS as seen from the

uncovered part of the Sun.
